name: Sceptile
author: Hitoshi Ariga
flavor_text: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.

abilities.name: Power of Nature
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to your Pokémon that have any {G} Energy attached to them by attacks from your opponent’s Ultra Beasts.

attacks.name: Powerful Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
